database.name: VIEW EEI_VIEW_INVOICE
database.view: SELECT a.c_invoice_id AS eei_view_invoice_id, a.c_invoice_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.documentno, sum(b.taxamt) AS taxamt, sum(b.taxbaseamt) AS taxbaseamt, c.c_tax_id, c.rate, c.em_eei_sri_tax_type, c.em_eei_sri_taxcat_code FROM c_invoice a LEFT JOIN c_invoicetax b ON a.c_invoice_id = b.c_invoice_id LEFT JOIN c_tax c ON b.c_tax_id = c.c_tax_id WHERE a.issotrx = 'N' GROUP BY a.c_invoice_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.documentno, c.c_tax_id, c.rate, c.em_eei_sri_tax_type, c.em_eei_sri_taxcat_code ORDER BY a.documentno
